Package it.polimi.ingsw.Client.Model

Class ChatMessagesStack

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Client.Model.Observable
it.polimi.ingsw.Client.Model.ChatMessagesStack
public class ChatMessagesStack extends Observable
The ChatMessagesStack class represents a circular buffer for storing chat messages. It extends Observable to notify observers of changes in the stack.

  • Field Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • ChatMessagesStack

      public ChatMessagesStack(int size)
      Constructs a ChatMessagesStack with a specified size.
      Parameters:
      size - The size of the circular buffer.

  • Method Details

    • add

      public void add(ChatMessageRecord message)
      Adds a new chat message to the stack. If the stack is full, the oldest message is overwritten.
      Parameters:
      message - The ChatMessageRecord to add to the stack.

    • getFirst

      public ChatMessageRecord getFirst()
      Retrieves the oldest message (first in the stack).
      Returns:
      The oldest ChatMessageRecord in the stack, or null if the stack is empty.

    • getLast

      public ChatMessageRecord getLast()
      Retrieves the newest message (last in the stack).
      Returns:
      The newest ChatMessageRecord in the stack, or null if the stack is empty.

    • get

      public ChatMessageRecord get(int i)
      Retrieves the message at a specific index in the stack.
      Parameters:
      i - The index of the message to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The ChatMessageRecord at the specified index.
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is out of bounds.

    • size

      public int size()
      Returns the number of messages currently in the stack.
      Returns:
      The number of messages in the stack.
